content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Water Supply System at position(-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=-0.5), storage tank (position x=-6.5, y=-0.5) and pipes connecting them ( PipeGroup at position x=-8.5, y=-0.5)

### Crude Oil Extraction System at position(17.5, 40.5)
Consists of pumpjack (position x=17.5, y=40.5), crude oil storage tank (position x=21.5, y=40.5) and pipes connecting them (PipeGroup at position x=18.5, y=38.5)

### Electricity Generation System at position(21.5, 44.0)
Consists of boiler (position x=21.5, y=44.0), steam engine (position x=25.5, y=46.5) and pipes connecting boiler to steam engine (PipeGroup at position x=21.5, y=42.5) and power poles connecting steam engine to pumpjack (ElectricityGroup id=79716)

### Oil Refinery at position(29.5, 39.5)
Consists of oil refinery (position x=29.5, y=39.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities at occupied or unplaceable positions
- Ensure the target location is clear and placeable before attempting to place an entity. (Step 3)

### Errors when connecting entities with pipes
- Ensure entities are properly aligned and positioned to be connected with pipes. Clear potential blockages before attempting to connect entities. (Step 5, Step 6)

## NAMESPACE

No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
